### Tender Announcement

#### Notice Title

**Semi-Automatic Wrapping Machine**
==============

* **English**: W1941-240006 Semi-Automatic Wrapping Machine
* **French**: W1941-240006 Emballeuse Semi-Automatique

#### Solicitation Data

| Field | Value |
| --- | --- |
| Solicitation Reference | WS4064918034-Doc4076936601 |
| Amendment Number | 7 |
| Solicitation Number | WS4064918034 |
| Publication Date | July 10, 2023 |
| Tender Closing Date | August 16, 2023, 14:00:00 |
| Amendment Date | August 7, 2023 |
| Expected Contract Start Date | Not Available |
| Expected Contract End Date | September 30, 2026 |

#### Tender Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of the Department of National Defence Canada, has issued this Request for Proposal (RFP) for the acquisition of a semi-automatic wrapping machine. The machine will include instruction manuals, delivery, training, as well as maintenance service. For more details, please refer to Annex A.

#### Tendering Information

| Field | Value |
| --- | --- |
| Procurement Method | Competitive - Open Bidding |
| Trade Agreements | Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) |
| Regions of Possibility | None |
| Regions of Delivery | Montréal, Québec, Canada |

#### Tender Evaluation Criteria

The tender will be evaluated based on the lowest price.

#### Contact Information

* **Name**: Dube, Stephane (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email**: stephane.dube@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Phone**: Not Available
* **Fax**: Not Available

#### Additional Information

* **Note**: The tender is now expired, and no further responses will be accepted.
* **Attachment**: None

Note: UNSPS codes and G-SINS codes have been removed as they were empty. If you need to include them, please provide the relevant information.
